#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

long long int f[1000];

void init () {
	f[0] = 0;
	f[1] = 1;
	for (int i=2; i<1000; i++) {
		f[i] = (f[i-1] + f[i-2])%1000000007;
	}
}

int main () {
	int tc;
	scanf("%d",&tc);
	init();
	while (tc--) {
		int a, b;
		scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
		long long g = __gcd(a,b);
		printf("%Ld\n",f[g]);
	}
return 0;
}
